object.creator: 开发者
object.name: VO_XMXXTZ
object.package: 底稿日期台账.项目信息台账

column.name: LXLX
column.option: 1|普通立项;2|书面立项(走书面立项流程)

column.name: GDJZRQ
column.describe: 项目完成/终止验收截止日期

column.name: GDSJRQ
column.describe: 项目完成/终止实际验收日期

column.name: ZZDGTJZKRQ
column.describe: 纸质底稿提交质控验收日期

column.name: DGYSYJCJRQ
column.describe: 纸质底稿验收意见出具日期

constraint.SQL: ["tIB_XMLX.ID in (SELECT ID FROM TIB_XMLX WHERE ID <> 100000 START WITH ID = 100000 CONNECT BY PRIOR ID = FID)",[]]

column.name: LXLX
column.option: 1|普通立项;2|书面立项(走书面立项流程)

column.name: GDSJRQ
column.describe: 项目完成/终止实际验收日期

column.name: ZZDGTJZKRQ
column.describe: 纸质底稿提交质控验收日期

column.name: DGYSYJCJRQ
column.describe: 纸质底稿验收意见出具日期

constraint.SQL: [" not exists (SELECT 1 FROM ECIF.TIB_XMXXTZ WHERE XMFL = 1 AND XMID = tIB_XMXX.ID)",[]]

column.name: GDSJRQ
column.describe: 项目完成/终止实际验收日期

column.name: ZZDGTJZKRQ
column.describe: 纸质底稿提交质控验收日期

column.name: DGYSYJCJRQ
column.describe: 纸质底稿验收意见出具日期
